short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in a serene night under the stars.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transforms your browser's new tab into a tranquil, awe-inspiring view of towering, snow-capped mountains under a vibrant green night sky. The serene reflection of the stars and mountains in the dark, meandering rivers below creates a peaceful, calming experience every time you open a new tab. Perfect for those who appreciate nature's beauty and the mystique of the night, this theme offers a refreshing and soothing ambiance for your browsing experience.
